message: been trying to find a good gem for forums in rails but couldn't find one that's in the caliber of phpBB
Is it easy to integrate a rails app with an existing php application, such as phpBB or SMF
Integrate how? You could make ActiveRecord look at the database...
How well does active record handle mapping to a non-active record data model?
@darkhelmetlive is right, that's commonly how people get access to a wordpress or forum db for user accounts, etc.
@benzittlau here's an example i whipped up, make sense? https://gist.github.com/884428 p.s. I've already had to do this twice and once with an Oracle DB no less so it does work :)
@benzittlau it just requires more mapping when setting up the model. Pretty much every rails assumption on column naming, etc. can be overwritten if one wishes to do so.
